summary: Two of the three prior issues were fixed, but validator expectations are still hardcoded instead of using vector iss/aud.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Falsy checks overwrite explicitly provided iat/exp (e.g., 0), breaking vectors that intentionally set boundary values.
previous_issues_status.notes: Updated to strict undefined checks for iat/exp.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Validator is hardcoded to fixed issuer/audience instead of vector values, violating conformance requirement and potentially masking failures.
previous_issues_status.notes: Static tests still pass hardcoded expectedIssuer/expectedAudience instead of using vector claims.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: req_hash consistency test ignores non-empty bodies and silently skips vectors that include req_body_bytes_base64.
previous_issues_status.notes: Now computes hash from req_body_bytes_base64 when present.
